items.title: Software Developer
items.description: Developing and maintaining web application using Laravel Nova and for front-end side of application Vue js. Git for version control Implementing Zendesk Api Integration

items.title: Junior Back-End Developer
items.description: • Developing and maintaining web application using PHP (Laravel,Pyro) for backend side of application and for front end side of the application we used Vue js and React. • Using Git for version control [Fork & Pull Model] • Reviewing other developers code on GitHub

items.title: Intern IT Support
items.description: • Installing Outlook and troubleshooting computer devices(Windows 8 , 7, 10 and Mac) and mobile devices (Android and IOS) as the company was going through an Office 365 migration. • Using Active Directory to keep account of current user information. • Using a ticketing system Fresh to complete tasks that clients were logging. • Helping to process a back log of bookings on their in-house built taxi service which was backlog by 3 years.
